pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
BREATHTAKING VIDEOS & PHOTOS

Contoso MARK8 is the first drone to offer an 8K HDR camera that tilts vertically at and angle of 180°, combined with an up to 2.8X lossless zoom and dolly zoom effect. 

–

2.8X FULL HD ZOOM
Reveal your inner filmmaker

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
FLYING IS A BREEZE

The easy-to-operate MARK8 is designed for high-quality aerial photography and cinematography. Fly, capture and share photos and videos directly from the mobile app. 

–

8K HDR VIDEOS AND 21MP PHOTOS
Perfection is in the details

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: The future of air traffic: safely sharing the skies with drones

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Earlier this year, the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) projected in its annual forecast that the number of commercial drones in the sky could triple by 2023.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Contoso called on drone pilots to assist first responders

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As always in the case of emergency efforts, it’s important to ensure the technology is used appropriately at a vital time and that drone pilots don’t accidentally disrupt first responders.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Pushing the Boundaries on Aerial Inspection

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Contoso Electronics and the Kansas department of transportation’s (KDOT) division of aviation has received authorization from the Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) to conduct unmanned aircraft system (UAS) test flights at Wichita’s Dwight D. Eisenhower National Airport (ICT).

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Miriam Graham, Contoso's new Chief Marketing Officer

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
We’re proud to welcome Miriam Graham, who is joining Contoso Electronics as Chief Marketing Officer.

In this role, Miriam will lead a consolidated organization that focuses on advertising, campaigns, communications, and research. This organization, which brings together team members from the former Contoso Customer Research team and the former Contoso Advertising group, is ideally positioned for deep customer learning and resulting product strategies that lead to increased brand recognition, growth and market share across Contoso businesses.   

Miriam brings a wealth of experience to this role. Most recently she served as International Marketing Director for Northwind Traders, where for seven years she oversaw global advertising and campaigns. Prior to that, she led the advertising division at Lucerne Publishing where she was the key contact for marketing strategies across internal organizations and external partners.  Throughout her career, she has amassed experience in sales, media planning, business development, and customer support. She has a solid reputation as a leader who is innovative, skilled, collaborative, and passionate. Additionally, she has advanced degrees in a Mass Communications and in Business.

Building the workspace of the future

A major renovation of Contoso's Singapore headquarters, along with workspace modernization projects around the globe, will help employees collaborate and create
Contoso Electronics has announced that its flagship store in Redmond, WA will open to the general public on July 10, 2020.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Contoso partners with non-profit to deliver life-saving supplies

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: An international team of scientists and health care workers have completed the world's first drone insulin delivery -- dropping off the life-saving medicine to a remote island in Singapore.

Accelerating global progress towards a more sustainable future. Since 2009, Contoso Electronics has made and met a series of commitments to reduce the company’s carbon footprint. While we’ve made progress toward our goal of cutting our operational carbon emissions by 75 percent by 2030, the magnitude and speed of the world’s environmental changes have made it increasingly clear that we must do more. And we are taking new steps to do just that.
Congratulations Contoso team! This September we set a new annual sales record.
The sales leadership recognizes high performing technology sales leaders that embody the ideals of customer oriented leadership.

In order to give customers fresh and clear experiences with their brand, companies need to focus on simplifying their customer experiences. Those efforts will drive innovation and growth for their business.

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: The importance of branding at Contoso

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: At the heart of branding at Contoso is the promise that is made by us to our customers. The brand promise tells them who we are, what we believe in, and what unique value we provide.
